time conversion

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

MJD[source]

MJD(met)

convert MET to MJD

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

UTC[source]

UTC(mjd)

convert MJD value to ISO date string

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert UTC(MJD(0))=='2001-01-01 00:01'
{% endraw %}

Configuration data classes

{% raw %}

class Config[source]

Config(verbose:int=3, use_cache:bool=True, mjd_range:Tuple=None, radius:float=5, cos_theta_max:float=0.4, z_max:float=100, time_interval:int=1, nside:int=1024, nest:bool=True, bins_per_decade:int=4, base_spectrum:str='lambda E: (E/1000)**-2.1', energy_range:Tuple=(100.0, 1000000.0), likelihood_rep:str='poisson')

Default light curve configuration parameters

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
Config()

Configuration parameters 
  verbose         : 3
  mjd_range       : None
  radius          : 5
  cos_theta_max   : 0.4
  z_max           : 100
  time_interval   : 1
  nside           : 1024
  nest            : True
  bins_per_decade : 4
  base_spectrum   : lambda E: (E/1000)**-2.1
  energy_range    : (100.0, 1000000.0)
  likelihood_rep  : poisson
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Files[source]

Files(data:str='$HOME/data', ft2:str='$HOME/work/lat-data/ft2', gti:str='$HOME/work/lat-data/binned/', aeff:str='$HOME/work/lat-data/aeff', weights:str='$HOME/onedrive/fermi/weight_files', cache:str='/tmp/light_curves')

paths to the various files that we need

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
files = Files()
files

File paths for light curves
  data       : /home/burnett/data
  ft2        : /home/burnett/work/lat-data/ft2
  gti        : /home/burnett/work/lat-data/binned
  aeff       : /home/burnett/work/lat-data/aeff
  weights    : /home/burnett/onedrive/fermi/weight_files
  cache      : /tmp/light_curves
{% endraw %}

Clear the cache before starting a test sequence

{% raw %} 
print(f"Files are {'valid' if files.valid else 'not valid'}")
files.clear_cache()

Files are valid
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PointSource[source]

PointSource(name, position=None)

Manage the position and name of a point source

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

PointSource.fk5[source]

PointSource.fk5(name, position)

position: (ra,dec) tuple

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for s, expect in [( PointSource('Geminga'),             'Source "Geminga" at: (l,b)=(195.134,4.266)'),
                  ( PointSource('gal_source', (0,0)),   'Source "gal_source" at: (l,b)=(0.000,0.000)', ),
                  ( PointSource.fk5('fk5_source',(0,0)),'Source "fk5_source" at: (l,b)=(96.337,-60.189)',)
                   ]:    
    assert str(s)==expect, f'expected {expect}, got {str(s)}'
{% endraw %}
